classifiers: Topic :: Desktop Environment :: K Desktop Environment (KDE)
info.description:
IVAO - Status was developed with the intention to Linux users community can check the status of players online on the IVAO network. This software it's almost clone of 'The Eye of IVAO' made for Windows, BUT with my littles new ideas and features

IVAO (International Virtual Aviation Organisation ™) for its acronym in English, is one of the most successful networks for flight simulation. You can find more information: http://www.ivao.aero.
info.name: IVAO-status
info.summary: Status of IVAO for Linux it's an application for Linux Users to see Pilots and Controllers in the IVAO network
info.html_description:
IVAO - Status was developed with the intention to Linux users community can check the status of players online on the IVAO network. This software it’s almost clone of ‘The Eye of IVAO’ made for Windows, BUT with my littles new ideas and features

IVAO (International Virtual Aviation Organisation ™) for its acronym in English, is one of the most successful networks for flight simulation. You can find more information: http://www.ivao.aero.
